div.p: ARE YOU? FINALLY TONIGHT, THE FACTOR TIP
OF THE DAY. TRAVELING, HAVE YOU EVER FELT
QUEASY IN A CAR, PLANE OR BOAT. ACCORDING TO BOTTOM LINE
MAGAZINE, THERE’S A SIMPLE REMEDY IF YOU ARE FAILING
NAUSEATED OR DIZZY. YOU SIMPLY PULL AND PINCH THE
SKIN IN THE MIDDLE OF YOUR INNER WRIST FOR A SHORT TIME.
YOU SHOULD FEEL BETTER. ALTHOUGH YOUR WRIST MIGHT BE A
LITTLE SORE. LIFE IS A SERIES OF TRADEOFFS,
THEY SAY IT WORKS. FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY.
AND THAT IS IT FOR US TONIGHT, PLEASE CHECK OUT THE
FOXNEWSFACTOR WEBSITE WHICH IS DIFFERENT FROM BILLO’REILLY.COM.
